column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=On the weekend I caught the train into the city .
#text=Before I left my house in the morning , I checked the train timetable online .
#text=I then walked to the train station .
#text=At the train station , I went to the ticket booth and asked for one return ticket to where I wanted to go .
#text=I paid the man at the booth and he gave me my ticket .
#text=I then sat down on a bench on the train platform and waited for my train to arrive .
#text=I stood up and got on the train .
#text=On the train , I found an empty seat and sat down .
#text=I pulled a book out of my bag and read it while I waited for the train to arrive at my stop .
#text=When the train conductor announced that the train had reached my stop , I stood up and exited the train .
